content.body:
Explicit Resource Management is still on the cusp of Stage 4, pending some final items:

The following PRs are still waiting on approval (ptomato is waiting on a response from Richard Gibson, ljharb, or Ms2ger):
- https://github.com/tc39/test262/pull/4482
- https://github.com/tc39/test262/pull/4480

The following PR is still awaiting review:
- https://github.com/tc39/test262/pull/4478

This has been held up for 8 months now waiting on reviews.
